topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5387d84b6368721e1d710000#post_5387d84b6368721e1d710000
That's an interesting project. Instead of cloning a true non-avian dinosaur (impossible for various reasons), he is just activating extinct traits in a chicken embryo, such as a long tail, clawed hands and such.
